Abstract

Our research focus was on improving the forecast of tomato/bag sales for a company named Scholle by using social media conversation. We received Sales data from Scholle spanning period of 2010 to 2018.Lagged social media data sourced from Twitter and Google Trends was regressed on Scholle data using various time series model.  Random Forest Model was found to be the most successful in predicting the Tomato bags Sales. From this study, we developed a set of analytical models when applied by Scholle improved the prediction of Tomato bag sales using social media data.
